original_text: And it came to pass, as the camels had done drinking, that the man took a golden earring of half a shekel weight, and two bracelets for her hands of ten shekels weight of gold;
korean_text: 낙타가 마시기를 다하매 그가 반 세겔 무게의 금 코걸이 한 개와 열 세겔 무게의 금 손목고리 한 쌍을 그에게 주며

sentences.original_text: as the camels had done drinking
that the man took a golden earring
and two bracelets for her hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 손을 위한 팔찌 두 개를

sentences.original_text: of ten shekels weight of gold
